TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RSACertificateExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for retrieving <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> implementations for the public and private keys of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RSA GetRSAPrivateKey(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> private key from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>.
Docs.returns: The private key, or `null` if the certificate does not have an RSA private key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RSA GetRSAPublicKey(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> public key from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>.
Docs.returns: The public key, or `null` if the certificate does not have an RSA public key.
